{{parent:Index}}
''This pages gives answers on regularly asked questions.''

= How do I delete a wiki page?

# Click on ##Edit page## to open the editor.
# Click on ##Delete##.
# Confirm the security query with "OK".

= How can I embedd a Java Applet?

Add the following code snipped to your wiki page:
@@
{{html}}
  <applet codebase="../" code="MyApplet.class" width="150" height="50">
  </applet>
{{/html}}
@@
